title: Model explaining No atomic energy levels

content.prompt: Which of the following properties of atoms helps explain the existence of discrete energy levels of atoms with one electron?

choices.label: Electrons orbit the nucleus in elliptical orbits.
An atomic nucleus exerts an attractive force on the electron.
Electrons are fundamental particles, while nucleons are made up of quarks.
The radius of the electron’s orbit is an integer multiple of the electron’s de Broglie wavelength.

topic.text: 15.2: The Bohr Model of Atomic Structure

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
